createUniqueFieldName

public java.lang.String createUniqueFieldName(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> existingFields,
                                              java.lang.String baseName,
                                              java.lang.String suffix,
                                              int maxLength)
                                       throws SummarizeException

Creates a new field name (not contained in the existingFields list), based in the provided baseName and suffix and with the provided maximum length. The following pattern is used to create the new names:

(baseName)(index)*(suffix)

Examples of created names:

baseName: "TERRAIN", suffix: "_MAX", maxLength: 11
 existingFields: {"TERRAIN_MAX"}
 created fields: "TERRAI0_MAX", "TERRAI1_MAX", "TERRAI2_MAX", ..., "TERRA00_MAX", "TERRA01_MAX", etc.

Parameters:
existingFields -
baseName -
sufix -
Returns:
Throws:
SummarizeException
